name: Armada Hoffler Properties, Inc.
description: Armada Hoffler Properties, Inc. is a publicly traded real estate investment trust (REIT) that is dedicated to the development, construction, and management of high-quality, mixed-use properties. Founded in 2001 and headquartered in Virginia Beach, Virginia, the company focuses on creating vibrant urban environments through the development of multifamily residential, retail, and office spaces. Armada Hoffler's portfolio includes properties in key markets along the East Coast of the United States, with a strong emphasis on community engagement and sustainability. The company is known for its commitment to quality and innovation, employing state-of-the-art construction techniques and environmentally friendly practices in its projects. With a diverse range of properties, Armada Hoffler aims to deliver stable cash flows and long-term value to its shareholders while enhancing the quality of life in the communities where it operates. The company's strategic vision involves leveraging its deep expertise in real estate to identify and capitalize on attractive investment opportunities in growth markets, thus positioning itself as a leader in the real estate sector.
